translations: 喃喃而语（mumble 的单数第三人称）

sentences.sentence: From his staff he earned the sobriquet "Mumbles."
sentences.translation: 他的员工们给了他“嘟囔”的绰号。

sentences.sentence: No one ever mumbles, stutters, or says "um..."
sentences.translation: 没有人会咕哝，结结巴巴说话，或说“um...”

sentences.sentence: And turning to me he mumbles savagely: "That cluck!"
sentences.translation: 说完他又转向我恶狠狠地咕哝道，“这个笨蛋！”
